description: A physical piece of equipment shall be presented as a physical asset.
title: Physical Asset
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: Physical asset classes supported by this physical asset. This physical asset supports the physical asset class property(s) associated with the physical asset class.
The physical asset property values of this physical asset.
The related object(s) makes up part of this physical asset as the whole.

links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.
Not part of the Standard Specs.

links.dtdl:name: description
links.dtdl:description: Additional information about the physical asset

links.dtdl:name: spatialDefinition
links.dtdl:description: Spatially defines the physical asset as a zero-dimensional point, one-dimensional line, or two-dimensional shape or three dimensional solid.

hierarchyScope.title: Hierarchy scope
hierarchyScope.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy. Optionally, hierarchy scopedefines the scope of the physical asset class, such as the site or area where it is defined.

fixedAssetID.title: Fixed asset ID
fixedAssetID.description: Contains a unique identification for financial tracking as required by laws or regulations

physicalLocationType.title: Physical location type
physicalLocationType.description: Indicates whether the physical location attribute refers to an operational location object or contains a description of the physical location. Mandatory where a physical location attribute is specified. Defined values are operational location: physical location attribute references an operational location; description: physical location attribute contains a description of the physical location, such as a street address.

oneOf.title: Operational Location
oneOf.description: physical location attribute references an operational location

oneOf.title: Description
oneOf.description: physical location attribute contains a description of the physical location, such as a street address.
